resources.string: Tap on the image to continue
Address: C-24, K-Park, Mahanagar Extension, near Indian Oil Petrol Pump, Kapoorthala Road, Lucknow, UP 226006

Daily Newspaper, Magazines, Tea, Coffee, Filter Water, High-Speed Internet & Competitive Exam .Gurukul Study Zone library is the best place for the students preparing for civil services, medical, SSC & other competitive exams. They maintain a peaceful environment for the self-study for the aspiring minds. The library provides free Wi-Fi. Their library is equipped with all the facilities like high-speed Internet & RO water.
Address: Sector J, B-47 Sector-A, Sector L, Aliganj, Lucknow, UP 226024

The Reader\'s Choice Library has self-illuminated tables and comfortable chairs paid economical printing and photocopying facilities. They provide free Wi-Fi for instant internet access. The library also offers English, Hindi newspaper, competitive and educational magazines. You can bring your book and study. They are open for 24-hours.
Address: both in ALIGANJ and ALAMBAGH

INFINIAN self study zone has centers both in ALIGANJ and ALAMBAGH .They are Nicely lit and have Daily newspapers, Magazines, Computers for speed Test, Motivational Novels, Competitive Exams Books, well ventilated, 24 hours study hall, Air Conditioned, high speed WiFi, CCTV surveillance, UPS power backup, nonvenomous chairs, shelves to place the books, clean washrooms , soundproof enclosure offering a calm and serene environment for those who are preparing for competitive exams like IAS, IPS, NEET, PG Medical, CA etc.
Address:1st floor, sector P, D-78 A, near Beli Garad Chauraha Main Road,Sector Q, Aliganj,Lucknow, Uttar Pradesh 226024
Scholar\'s Library has Wifi ,newspaper, ac, cafeteria and competitive exams books

Kanpur Central library is situated in the heart of the city in Kalyanpur. It is said to be a part of Chhatrapati Shahuji Maharaj University and is connected to the prestigious campus. It is available in both online as well as offline mode. As in the ones who are able to access the library physically can go to the college campus comprising the library which is enriched with great potential and resources of unending knowledge as an offering for its people. Along with this they also have their official website which can be accessed by those who are although unable to go to the library personally but can without a doubt make use of the technology and digitalisation to have an edge over the others and opens at 10 AM

As the name itself indicates the major contributing factor which is responsible for helping this library to make a significant position for itself as one of the top 10 libraries of Kanpur. The library is located inside the HBTU campus located in the eastern side of Nawabganj area in Kanpur. The location also serves as a major plus point for the place as it can be easily accessed by its readers. The ones who are more comfortable in going personally are assisted with great connectivity to the area from 10 Am onwards. Along with this, the rest can also make use of the official website by obtaining the membership and sometimes even without it can gain enough knowledge about different concepts

The library possesses the best and most updated resources of knowledge for its receivers from all modes something makes the concept really different. And is a centre of attraction for its enormous knowledge hub like an aura. The library can be accessed from 8 AM onwards by its eager knowledge seekers.

It is definitely one of the top 10 libraries in Kanpur situated in Lakhanpur region of Kanpur and opens at 10 Am. It is able to provide the knowledge resources to such an extent that more and more people can be benefited from the vast knowledge resources. It has been rated approximately 3 out of 5 stars as per Google ratings.

Kanpur Public Library is located at Lalimili Chauraha in Chunniganj area of the city and is known to be a prominent occupant of top 10 libraries in Kanpur. The reason being it is open for everyone in the city who are free to access the library with help of membership and can have unending access to all the great information as per their requirements from 8 Am onwards.
Address: Ardali Bazar Road LT College Campus, Orderly Bazar, Varanasi, UP 221002
Timings: Mon - Sat 5:30 am - 7:00 pm ,Sunday Closed

Government District Library has basic amenities like parking and RO water facilities. They maintain a peaceful and green zone that helps the readers to read the books without any disturbance. The library is open for the public and helps especially for the people who seek competitive exams to examine the peaceful reading experience.
Address: Godowlia Road, Jalans, Gyanwapi, Opposite Sandhya Sarees, Harha, Varanasi, UP 221001

Karmaical Library Association is one of the old libraries in Varanasi and surrounding areas. The library has a wide range of books from various genres and also has the latest published books at an affordable cost. They contain different books that suites for all age groups.
Address: Kashikatha Library, Ramnagar, Kodopur, Varanasi, UP 221008
Timings: Mon - Sat 7:00 am - 5:00 pm, Sunday Closed

Kashikatha Library provides a wide variety of books for all age groups. They make sure to offer you the best combination of well-stocked library and tranquil reading room for the peaceful reading experience. Their zero noise zone helps them to stand out from already existing Libraries in Varanasi

Shree Vishvnath Pustakalaya issues maximum of 2 books for 15 days.There is no installation of computers and no library automation.It has a total collection of 10000 books in various languages like Sanskrit, Hindi, English, Urdu, German, French, Nepali, Pali, Tamil and Telgu.The newspaper preservation policy is of last 6 months.

Sharswati Sadan Pustakalaya has no installation of computers and no library automation.It has a total collection of 5000 books in various languages like Sanskrit, Hindi, English and Urdu.The newspaper preservation policy is of last 2 months.
Address: Chandra Sekhar Azad Park, Allahabad, UP 211002
Timings: Fri - Wed 8:00 am - 6:00 pm ,Thursday Closed

Allahabad Public Library provides a wide range of books, magazines, newspapers and other study materials in Hindi, English, Sanskrit, Urdu, Arabic, Persian, Bengali, French and other languages for all ages. The library caters the informational, educational and recreational need of library users and society. They offer quality library services to all readers with a positive attitude and strive to earn the trust and confidence of all readers. They also demonstrate friendliness, reliability and proactiveness to offering timely services.It has a collection of about 1.25 lakh books on various subjects like Reprographics Services, IAS, PCS, UGC-NET, SSC, Railway, Bank, Engineering, Medical Book, Reference Service and Manuscripts .It has rare Arabic manuscripts along with papers of Parliament
Address: Central State Library, North Malaka, Near Durga Temple, Allahabad, UP 211001
Timings: Wed - Mon 8:00 am - 5:00 pm , Tuesday Closed

Central State Library has a vast collection of Hindi books. They also have a separate AC room for newspaper reading. The library also has a separate room for children. The staffs at the library are aware of the latest published books to provide the current trend books like Literature, Periodicals, English Books, Comics and Graphic Novels, Children Books, Competitive Exams, Crime, Travel, Horror, Science and Fiction Books.
Address: 9, Manmohan Park Road, Above Muthooth Finance, Old Katra, Allahabad, UP 211002

Lakshya Library has a fully air-conditioned, blower facility during the winter season, CCTV surveillance and has a separate seat for girls. The library maintains a zero noise environment to provide the readers with the disturbance-free reading experience.It has a collection of Periodicals, Magazines, Novels, History Books, Non-Fiction Book, Classic, History, Art, Poetry, Audiobooks, Fiction Book, Hindi Books and Newspaper
